results.content: This course is highly recommended for beginners. I was a complete beginner when I started this course. After completing this course I am better equipped with wordpress and I am confident that I can create a spectacular website on my own. Umair's way of teaching is excellent. He explained everything step by step in such a way that a complete beginner could become a professional wordpress user by doing this course.
